answerText: Ryunosuke Akutagawa[10] This other story by Akutagawa tells of a man who sees a woman stealing hair from corpses at the title location and is disgusted by her, so he steals her robe and leaves.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 12 | 5 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author wrote about a man who sees the greatest painting ever but fails to purchase it in the story "Autumn Mountain." [10] Name this author who wrote another story consisting of several conflicting accounts of a man's murder and his wife's rape.
